  <!-- Critical JS -->
  <script>
   (function(H){H.className=H.className.replace(/\bno-js\b/,'enhanced')})(document.documentElement)
  </script>
  <script>
   window.PP={};window.PP.utils={};window.PP.config={};PP.config.donateBanner={secondsUntilShown:0.25,daysForDonateBarDismissal:3};;(function(win,undefined){win.PP=win.PP||{};win.PP.utils=win.PP.utils||{};var PP=win.PP;// loadJS: load a JS file asynchronously. Included from https://github.com/filamentgroup/loadJS/
function loadJS(src,cb){"use strict";var ref=window.document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];var script=window.document.createElement("script");script.src=src;script.async=true;ref.parentNode.insertBefore(script,ref);if(cb&&typeof cb==="function"){script.onload=cb}return script}PP.utils.loadJS=loadJS;// cookie function from https://github.com/filamentgroup/cookie/
function cookie(name,value,days){// if value is undefined, get the cookie value
if(value===undefined){var cookiestring="; "+window.document.cookie;var cookies=cookiestring.split("; "+name+"=");if(cookies.length===2){return cookies.pop().split(";").shift()}return null}else{var expires;var domain;// if value is a false boolean, we'll treat that as a delete
if(value===false){days=-1}if(days){var date=new Date;date.setTime(date.getTime()+days*24*60*60*1000);expires="; expires="+date.toGMTString()}else{expires=""}// check if we're in dev, if not, lets make it a domain-wide cookie
if(location.hostname=="localhost"||location.hostname=="127.0.0.1"){domain=""}else{domain="; domain=.propublica.org"}window.document.cookie=name+"="+value+expires+domain+"; path=/"}}// expose it
PP.utils.cookie=cookie;// basic logging function
function log(logLine){const logOn=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("__pp-debug");if(logOn!==null){console.log(logLine)}}// expose it
PP.utils.log=log})(this);;(function(win,undefined){// Enable JS strict mode
"use strict";// Environment variables
var PP=win.PP,utils=PP.utils,docClasses=[];// if ( "sessionStorage" in window ) {
//
//     // Font loading!
//     var fontsClass = "fonts-loaded";
//
//     if ( sessionStorage.getItem( "fontsLoaded" ) === "loaded" ) {
//         docClasses.push( fontsClass );
//     } else {
//         // Okay! Let’s watch for font events!
//         var tiemposText = new FontFaceObserver( "Tiempos Text", {
//             weight: 400
//         } );
//         var tiemposTextItalic = new FontFaceObserver( "Tiempos Text", {
//             style: "italic",
//             weight: 400
//         } );
//         var tiemposTextBold = new FontFaceObserver( "Tiempos Text", {
//             weight: 700
//         } );
//         var tiemposTextBoldItalic = new FontFaceObserver( "Tiempos Text", {
//             style: "italic",
//             weight: 700
//         } );
//         var graphik = new FontFaceObserver( "Graphik", {
//             weight: 400
//         } );
//         var graphikItalic = new FontFaceObserver( "Graphik", {
//             style: "italic",
//             weight: 400
//         } );
//         var graphikBold = new FontFaceObserver( "Graphik", {
//             weight: 700
//         } );
//         var graphikBoldItalic = new FontFaceObserver( "Graphik", {
//             style: "italic",
//             weight: 700
//         } );
//
//         // When the fonts above are loaded, we'll attach a .fonts-loaded class to the document. (Per https://www.filamentgroup.com/lab/font-events.html) We'll also append the class to the `html`.
//         win.Promise
//             .all( [
//                 tiemposText.load(),
//                 tiemposTextItalic.load(),
//                 tiemposTextBold.load(),
//                 tiemposTextBoldItalic.load(),
//                 graphik.load(),
//                 graphikItalic.load(),
//                 graphikBold.load(),
//                 graphikBoldItalic.load()
//             ] )
//             .then( function() {
//                 win.document.documentElement.className += " " + fontsClass;
//                 sessionStorage.setItem( "fontsLoaded" , "loaded" );
//             } );
//     }
// }
// Add scoping classes to HTML element
win.document.documentElement.className+=" "+docClasses.join(" ")})(this);
//# sourceMappingURL=initial.js.map
  </script>
  <!-- DFP JS -->
  <script async="" src="https://htlbid.com/v3/propublica.org/htlbid.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   window.htlbid = window.htlbid || {};
htlbid.cmd = htlbid.cmd || [];
htlbid.cmd.push(function() {
    htlbid.layout("universal"); // Leave as "universal" or add custom layout
        htlbid.setTargeting("is_testing", "no");
        htlbid.setTargeting("is_home", "no"); // Set to "yes" on the homepage
});
  </script>

       </li>
       <li class="action-nav-item social twitter">

     <div class="masthead-inner-wrapper">

          <path d="M7.5,11.77c-2.7,0-4.9-1.58-4.9-3.52L3,5.65a.38.38,0,0,1,.43-.31.37.37,0,0,1,.31.42L3.35,8.3C3.35,9.78,5.21,11,7.5,11s4.15-1.24,4.15-2.77l-.37-2.49a.37.37,0,0,1,.31-.42.38.38,0,0,1,.43.31l.37,2.54C12.4,10.19,10.2,11.77,7.5,11.77Z">
          </path>
          <path d="M9.8,15a.37.37,0,0,1-.37-.38V6.7l-2-2.26a.36.36,0,0,1,0-.52A.37.37,0,0,1,8,4l2.06,2.36a.39.39,0,0,1,.1.25v8.06A.38.38,0,0,1,9.8,15Z">
          </path>
         </svg>
         Education
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="topics-nav-item more">
        <a href="/topics/">
         More…
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <!-- end .topics-nav -->

  </div>
  <!-- end .masthead-wrap -->
  <main class="content" id="main" role="main" tabindex="-1">
   <div id="content-top">
   </div>
   <div class="wrapper">
    <div class="features" id="level1">
     <div class="story-entry f1 region-national section-articles">
      <h2 class="a11y">
       Featured Stories
      </h2>
      <div class="lead-art">
       <a class="aspect-3-2" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/how-to-file-your-state-and-federal-taxes-for-free-in-2021">
        <img alt="" height="267" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%273%27%20height%3D%272%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0317-ben-hickey-tax-guide-3000x2000px.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=267&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=5cb029c7f4e2ac45b659a861e0cd799d 400w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0317-ben-hickey-tax-guide-3000x2000px.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=533&amp;q=80&amp;w=800&amp;s=c05af5516eb4c6f663a6897991803660 800w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0317-ben-hickey-tax-guide-3000x2000px.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=800&amp;q=90&amp;w=1200&amp;s=0b9e59e128026c627b507825e766fa5a 1200w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0317-ben-hickey-tax-guide-3000x2000px.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=1067&amp;q=80&amp;w=1600&amp;s=e0f9fb963d325d9801991353d77d3b78 1600w" width="400"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <div class="series-header">
        <a class="series-title" href="https://www.propublica.org/series/the-propublica-free-tax-guide">
         The ProPublica Free Tax Guide
        </a>
       </div>
       <h3 class="hed">
        <a class="f1-link" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/how-to-file-your-state-and-federal-taxes-for-free-in-2021">
         How to File Your State and Federal Taxes for Free in 2021
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="dek">
        <p>
         TurboTax and other tax prep services advertise themselves as “free,” but we found several ways that they tricked people into paying. Here’s our guide to preparing and filing your 2020 taxes without falling into that trap.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <span class="name">
          Kristen Doerer
         </span>
         for
         <a href="https://www.propublica.org">
          ProPublica
         </a>
         ,
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/justin-elliott">
          Justin Elliott
         </a>
         and
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/karim-doumar">
          Karim Doumar
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-17EDT17:15">
          March 17, 5:15 p.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <!-- end .story-entry.f1 -->
     <div class="story-entry f2 region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art">
       <a class="aspect-3-2" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/senator-says-censorship-in-turkey-raises-serious-questions-about-facebooks-commitment-to-free-expression">
        <img alt="" height="267" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%273%27%20height%3D%272%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210318-gillum-facebook-folo-3000x2000_2021-03-18-182833.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=267&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=c4fe7014e84a484c89fc8db61dc872e7 400w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210318-gillum-facebook-folo-3000x2000_2021-03-18-182833.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=533&amp;q=80&amp;w=800&amp;s=dbe223f7a1a1a5419fc4a4e9fd068268 800w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210318-gillum-facebook-folo-3000x2000_2021-03-18-182833.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=800&amp;q=90&amp;w=1200&amp;s=5ba8bfff522534e4987a52f8bcd247bc 1200w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210318-gillum-facebook-folo-3000x2000_2021-03-18-182833.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=1067&amp;q=80&amp;w=1600&amp;s=aefb3ed83a85189fc2f3ec373a517c83 1600w" width="400"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h3 class="hed">
        <a class="f2-link" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/senator-says-censorship-in-turkey-raises-serious-questions-about-facebooks-commitment-to-free-expression">
         Senator Says Censorship in Turkey Raises “Serious Questions” About Facebook's Commitment to Free Expression
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="dek">
        <p>
         After ProPublica reported that Facebook blocked a militia group targeted by Turkish forces, the chair of the Senate Finance Committee demanded that Mark Zuckerberg provide answers to more than a dozen questions.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/jack-gillum">
          Jack Gillum
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-18EDT15:00">
          March 18, 3 p.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <!-- end .story-entry.f2 -->
     <div class="features-group-f3-f4">
      <div class="story-entry f3 region-local-reporting-network section-articles">
       <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
        <a class="f3-link" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/theres-only-one-state-where-falling-behind-on-rent-could-mean-jail-time-that-could-change">
         <picture>
          <source media="(min-width: 48em)" sizes="(min-width: 1720px) 89px, (min-width: 960px) calc(4.86vw + 6px), (min-width: 768px) calc(7.5vw + 4px)" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=308d2a4ecccad0b244aa392afcadc8e1 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=7cca44047e77fd5ff01d3c3e1981f019 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=780a3e3fdaffcba15aace65aef9acaab 400w"/>
          <source media="(max-width: 48em)" sizes="43.7vw" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=267&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=58fb51ebbb5ffe99b16bd3d5a1edee62 400w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=533&amp;q=80&amp;w=800&amp;s=5d0aac243f1cb1e381bb05689763aa79 800w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=800&amp;q=90&amp;w=1200&amp;s=ff752c8e474510f08cd2361fd48f99a9 1200w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=1067&amp;q=80&amp;w=1600&amp;s=40390b1204058f33a431028b4b7649c3 1600w"/>
          <img alt="" src="https://assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2020-1026-arkansas-evictions-matt-williams-home.jpeg"/>
         </picture>
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="description">
        <h3 class="hed">
         <a class="f3-link" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/theres-only-one-state-where-falling-behind-on-rent-could-mean-jail-time-that-could-change">
          There’s Only One State Where Falling Behind on Rent Could Mean Jail Time. That Could Change.
         </a>
         <div class="dek">
          <p>
           Only Arkansas permits criminal consequences for nonpayment of rent — and it has enforced the law during the pandemic. Now, after ProPublica investigated the practice, some legislators want to revoke the statute.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="metadata">
          <p class="byline">
           by
           <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/maya-miller">
            Maya Miller
           </a>
           and
           <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/ellis-simani">
            Ellis Simani
           </a>
           , ProPublica, and
           <span class="name">
            Benjamin Hardy
           </span>
           ,
           <a href="https://arknews.org/">
            Arkansas Nonprofit News Network
           </a>
          </p>
          <p class="timestamp">
           <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-19EDT13:00">
            March 19, 1 p.m. EDT
           </time>
          </p>
         </div>
        </h3>
       </div>
      </div>
      <!-- end .story-entry.f3 -->
      <div class="story-entry f4 region-national section-articles">
       <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
        <a class="f4-link" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/eitc-2021">
         <picture>
          <source media="(min-width: 48em)" sizes="(min-width: 1720px) 89px, (min-width: 960px) calc(4.86vw + 6px), (min-width: 768px) calc(7.5vw + 4px)" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=e18be698f6ccc1c9db9f3c1b597b09f4 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=11bb52cfa770da306b6a9c4e2caa3858 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=cc0bfff0e1796af31debbc5826f39d80 400w"/>
          <source media="(max-width: 48em)" sizes="43.7vw" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=267&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=f65ccbddd05097ed52cf4cbbdfbe7086 400w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=533&amp;q=80&amp;w=800&amp;s=8084a8cc075f931306c561bb7a136287 800w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=800&amp;q=90&amp;w=1200&amp;s=7cbcd4691bbf7bff69c64c8e710e7d49 1200w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=1067&amp;q=80&amp;w=1600&amp;s=c991bf1a424ec332073f109f7f49d9ca 1600w"/>
          <img alt="" src="https://assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-eitc-3000x2000.jpg"/>
         </picture>
        </a>
       </div>
       <div class="description">
        <div class="series-header">
         <a class="series-title" href="https://www.propublica.org/series/the-propublica-free-tax-guide">
          The ProPublica Free Tax Guide
         </a>
        </div>
        <h3 class="hed">
         <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/eitc-2021">
          What Is the Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC), and Do I Qualify for It?
         </a>
         <div class="dek">
          <p>
           The earned income tax credit is meant to reduce the amount that low- and moderate-income Americans have to pay in taxes — and it can sometimes result in a refund. Figuring out whether you qualify can be confusing. This guide can help.
          </p>
         </div>
         <div class="metadata">
          <p class="byline">
           by
           <span class="name">
            Kristen Doerer
           </span>
           for
           <a href="https://www.propublica.org">
            ProPublica
           </a>
           and
           <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/karim-doumar">
            Karim Doumar
           </a>
          </p>
          <p class="timestamp">
           <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-19EDT05:00">
            March 19, 5 a.m. EDT
           </time>
          </p>
         </div>
        </h3>
       </div>
      </div>
      <!-- end .story-entry.f4 -->
     </div>
    </div>
    <!-- end #level1.features -->
    <div class="promo-covid" id="level1a">
     <div class="pp-module" id="r6">
      <div class="module-content" id="covid-module">
       <div class="group-cover">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/series/coronavirus">
         <h2 class="pp-module-title">
          COVID-19
         </h2>
        </a>
        <div class="lead-art">
         <a class="" href="https://www.propublica.org/series/coronavirus">
          <img alt="" sizes="100vw" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%2730%27%20height%3D%2740%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-c3.propublica.org/images/series/20200701-coronavirus-series-C.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=1067&amp;q=80&amp;w=800&amp;s=2eda8d818e708cae593da2712085f442 800w, https://img.assets-c3.propublica.org/images/series/20200701-coronavirus-series-C.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=800&amp;q=75&amp;w=600&amp;s=58b81b1531fbb12cd34309c063a6e793 600w, https://img.assets-c3.propublica.org/images/series/20200701-coronavirus-series-C.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=65&amp;w=300&amp;s=7a71a2a4bd82d040d54b46f8b0d7ce27 300w"/>
         </a>
        </div>
        <!-- end .lead-art -->
       </div>
       <!-- end .group-header -->
       <div class="group-features">
        <h3 class="group-header">
         Featured Reporting on the Crisis
        </h3>
        <div class="story-entry">
         <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
          <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/how-inequity-gets-built-into-americas-vaccination-system">
           <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0225-vaccine-access-3x2-1color.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=244389cc81ddab6489178ed460c50475 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0225-vaccine-access-3x2-1color.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=e4ba764e6de0604b61aeddff5126fc61 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0225-vaccine-access-3x2-1color.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=afb370f26e81bd85bce06fcd74028553 400w" width="75"/>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="description">
          <h3 class="hed">
           <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/how-inequity-gets-built-into-americas-vaccination-system">
            How Inequity Gets Built Into America’s Vaccination System
           </a>
          </h3>
          <div class="dek">
           <p>
            People eligible for the coronavirus vaccine tell us they are running up against barriers that are designed into the very systems meant to serve those most at risk of dying of the disease. We plan to continue tracking these roadblocks.
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="metadata">
           <p class="byline">
            by
            <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/maryam-jameel">
             Maryam Jameel
            </a>
            and
            <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/caroline-chen">
             Caroline Chen
            </a>
           </p>
           <p class="timestamp">
            <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-01EST05:00">
             March 1, 5 a.m. EST
            </time>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- end .story-entry.f1 -->
        <div class="story-entry">
         <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
          <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/covid-vaccine-supply">
           <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210219-covid-vax-supply-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.3091&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=425ba7b784cb337e4984dfd674c9a677 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210219-covid-vax-supply-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.3091&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=e3d36c682a21520f967999d5c1b77888 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210219-covid-vax-supply-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.3091&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=b56096ee41b6ea134bf8dd0b429b1c90 400w" width="75"/>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="description">
          <h3 class="hed">
           <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/covid-vaccine-supply">
            Why We Can’t Make Vaccine Doses Any Faster
           </a>
          </h3>
          <div class="dek">
           <p>
            President Biden has promised enough doses for all American adults by this summer. There’s not much even the Defense Production Act can do to deliver doses before then.
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="metadata">
           <p class="byline">
            by
            <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/isaac-arnsdorf">
             Isaac Arnsdorf
            </a>
            and
            <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/ryan-gabrielson">
             Ryan Gabrielson
            </a>
           </p>
           <p class="timestamp">
            <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-02-19EST05:00">
             Feb. 19, 5 a.m. EST
            </time>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- end .story-entry.f1 -->
       </div>
       <!-- /end .covid-features -->
       <div class="group-resources">

    <div class="evergreen" id="level1b">
     <div class="pp-module" id="featured-series-module">
      <div class="module-content" id="featured-series">
       <h2 class="pp-module-title">
        Vaccinating America
       </h2>
       <a href="https://www.propublica.org/series/vaccines">
        <img alt="" class="series-img" sizes="100vw" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%2730%27%20height%3D%2740%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210309-vaccine-series-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.4752&amp;fp-y=0.8284&amp;h=1067&amp;q=80&amp;w=800&amp;s=05038ba77a3827df6e95ec100db350b6 800w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210309-vaccine-series-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.4752&amp;fp-y=0.8284&amp;h=800&amp;q=75&amp;w=600&amp;s=15da5cccc2014b0bd6fbba2b375bb373 600w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210309-vaccine-series-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.4752&amp;fp-y=0.8284&amp;h=400&amp;q=65&amp;w=300&amp;s=0878429d795fb074c97c8f4e8442e8ac 300w"/>
       </a>
       <div class="series-detail">
        <p>
         Tracking the rollout of the COVID-19 vaccines as the United States emerges from the pandemic.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/as-new-york-city-moves-to-address-racialized-policing-of-sex-work-advocates-and-lawyers-say-its-not-enough">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210318-nypd-sex-work-folo.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=153001dc31172a678959783f18460c4a 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210318-nypd-sex-work-folo.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=bbec75eb260fcb844acec13c5173a806 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210318-nypd-sex-work-folo.jpeg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=ae3e01dd12e9107631fab0f43e7fb2e7 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/as-new-york-city-moves-to-address-racialized-policing-of-sex-work-advocates-and-lawyers-say-its-not-enough">
         As New York City Moves to Address Racialized Policing of Sex Work, Advocates and Lawyers Say It’s Not Enough
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        In the wake of a 2020 ProPublica investigation, Mayor Bill de Blasio has called for convening a task force to address problems with how the city polices the sex trade. “But it feels like planning to make a plan,” one attorney said.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/joshua-kaplan">
          Joshua Kaplan
         </a>
         and
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/joaquin-sapien">
          Joaquin Sapien
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-18EDT14:19">
          March 18, 2:19 p.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/tinder-and-okcupid-could-soon-let-you-background-check-your-date-for-a-price">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-background-checks-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=e0849db3526b82c5d85cf29bdb3b6b06 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-background-checks-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=eacf2102815a0b33b40456fe8e95afc9 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/2021-0318-background-checks-3000x2000.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=12a6e64304c20d081fe1d4a553612c26 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/tinder-and-okcupid-could-soon-let-you-background-check-your-date-for-a-price">
         Tinder and OkCupid Could Soon Let You Background Check Your Date — for a Price
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        Dogged by questions about sexual violence, Match Group — which owns Tinder, Hinge, Match.com, OkCupid, PlentyofFish and others — is investing in a company that aims to enable background checks on apps. Some legislators say it’s not enough.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <span class="name">
          Brian Edwards
         </span>
         and
         <span class="name">
          Elizabeth Naismith Picciani
         </span>
         ,
         <a href="https://journalism.columbia.edu/careers/postgraduate-fellowships/cji">
          Columbia Journalism Investigations
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-18EDT12:18">
          March 18, 12:18 p.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-texas section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/the-people-we-left-behind-how-closing-a-dangerous-border-camp-adds-to-inequities">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-mpp-left-behind-6.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=b6a246cf06b6b2cd34edddd444a26ffb 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-mpp-left-behind-6.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=4f3d5db816e8980470741d3f6205846e 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-mpp-left-behind-6.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=6764be478b3e9da36f05ea29a073d72c 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/the-people-we-left-behind-how-closing-a-dangerous-border-camp-adds-to-inequities">
         For Some Transgender Asylum Seekers, Fleeing a Dangerous Migrant Camp Meant Being Left Behind
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        The Biden administration shuttered a migrant tent camp in Mexico that was created under a Trump policy. Immigration advocates praised the move, but the closure adds to growing confusion over which migrants are let in or left out.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/lomi-kriel">
          Lomi Kriel
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-18EDT07:00">
          March 18, 6 a.m. CDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/only-two-nypd-officers-face-serious-discipline-from-a-watchdogs-investigations-into-abuse-of-black-lives-matter-protesters">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/CCRB_3_2021_large_new-3x2.png?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=80&amp;w=75&amp;s=dac1435192521b28fb6ba8c5638ac686 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/CCRB_3_2021_large_new-3x2.png?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=80&amp;w=150&amp;s=72dc9f416b9122b3dac39340909e8735 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/CCRB_3_2021_large_new-3x2.png?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=80&amp;w=400&amp;s=662195e8eecddd165836da0a142ec805 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/only-two-nypd-officers-face-serious-discipline-from-a-watchdogs-investigations-into-abuse-of-black-lives-matter-protesters">
         Only Two NYPD Officers Face Serious Discipline From a Watchdog’s Investigations Into Abuse of Black Lives Matter Protesters
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        After ProPublica detailed the lack of disclosure about protest cases by New York City’s Civilian Complaint Review Board, the agency has revealed how little progress has been made on many of the investigations.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/eric-umansky">
          Eric Umansky
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-17EDT18:30">
          March 17, 6:30 p.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/hacking-water-systems">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210317-water-hacking-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.503&amp;fp-y=0.2881&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=4bbc652d67b6ef42b97004925c86a8f0 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210317-water-hacking-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.503&amp;fp-y=0.2881&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=2b7581378fbe9a08e84935029869f42e 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210317-water-hacking-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.503&amp;fp-y=0.2881&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=20a6a8f6af6aab8e65c4cbb76aa20fa1 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/hacking-water-systems">
         America’s Drinking Water Is Surprisingly Easy to Poison
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        The cyberbreach at a plant in Oldsmar, Florida, which could have resulted in a mass poisoning, was a reminder of a disturbing reality: Despite a decade of warnings, thousands of water systems around the country are still at risk.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/peter-elkind">
          Peter Elkind
         </a>
         and
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/jack-gillum">
          Jack Gillum
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-17EDT05:00">
          March 17, 5 a.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/biden-abrio-el-estatus-legal-temporal-a-miles-de-inmigrantes-estas-son-las-formas-en-que-podrian-quedar-atrapados">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-temporary-status-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=11587610c768b675bf9cca0fc13bea42 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-temporary-status-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=a3a3ccb53de4ad481eceda57e6aa266a 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-temporary-status-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=dbf646236324f78c490c5a6e4c64ce69 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/biden-abrio-el-estatus-legal-temporal-a-miles-de-inmigrantes-estas-son-las-formas-en-que-podrian-quedar-atrapados">
         Biden abrió el estatus legal temporal a miles de inmigrantes. Estas son las formas en que podrían quedar atrapados.
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        Miles de inmigrantes venezolanos y birmanos acaban de solicitar el Estatus de Protección Temporal. Sin embargo, mientras los congresistas demócratas trabajan en una trayectoria hacia la ciudadanía para inmigrantes que tienen esa calidad migratoria desde hace décadas, los nuevos beneficiarios podrían quedar fuera del proceso.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         por
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/dara-lind">
          Dara Lind
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-16EDT18:02">
          March 16, 6:02 p.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-atPropublica">
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/atpropublica/propublica-editor-in-chief-stephen-engelberg-wins-goldsmith-career-award">
         ProPublica Editor-in-Chief Stephen Engelberg Wins Goldsmith Career Award
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/propublica">
          ProPublica
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-16EDT17:18">
          March 16, 5:18 p.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/biden-opened-temporary-legal-status-to-thousands-of-immigrants-heres-how-they-could-end-up-trapped">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-temporary-status-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=11587610c768b675bf9cca0fc13bea42 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-temporary-status-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=a3a3ccb53de4ad481eceda57e6aa266a 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210316-temporary-status-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=dbf646236324f78c490c5a6e4c64ce69 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/biden-opened-temporary-legal-status-to-thousands-of-immigrants-heres-how-they-could-end-up-trapped">
         Biden Opened Temporary Legal Status to Thousands of Immigrants. Here’s How They Could End Up Trapped.
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        Thousands of Venezuelan and Burmese immigrants just got to apply for temporary protected status. But as congressional Democrats work on a path to citizenship for immigrants who’ve had the status for decades, new grantees could be left out.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/dara-lind">
          Dara Lind
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-16EDT11:15">
          March 16, 11:15 a.m. EDT
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/what-propublica-is-doing-about-diversity-in-2021">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/Ran-Zheng-Diversity-Final.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=d94cabfdd37ba944be361fbbdb014579 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/Ran-Zheng-Diversity-Final.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=c1477d21bddc442c0a19fcff810be709 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/Ran-Zheng-Diversity-Final.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=ae7e8a4bd2c665aa726fa9f0ffb267e7 400w" width="75"/>

      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/what-propublica-is-doing-about-diversity-in-2021">
         What ProPublica Is Doing About Diversity in 2021
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        Here is our annual report on the breakdown of our staff and how we’re working to create a more diverse news organization and inclusive journalism community.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/caroline-chen">
          Caroline Chen
         </a>
         ,
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/lena-groeger">

         </a>
         and
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/liz-sharp">
          Liz Sharp
         </a>

       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/this-billionaire-governors-coal-companies-owe-millions-more-in-environmental-fines">
         This Billionaire Governor’s Coal Companies Owe Millions More in Environmental Fines
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        The richest person in West Virginia, who is also the state’s governor, owns coal companies that routinely violate environmental laws. Latest filings say the companies owe over $3 million for not complying with a major water pollution settlement.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <span class="name">
          Ken Ward Jr.
         </span>
         ,  Mountain State Spotlight
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-12EST16:30">
          March 12, 4:30 p.m. EST
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/to-hold-the-government-accountable-we-need-to-know-what-its-doing-thats-why-were-tracking-ppp-data">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210312-ppp-loans-lawsuit-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.8961&amp;fp-y=0.4221&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=61596514e9cd2f2b9984931f009c3319 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210312-ppp-loans-lawsuit-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.8961&amp;fp-y=0.4221&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=3f6aefbebf7c8e542fa9254c1df21b3c 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210312-ppp-loans-lawsuit-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.8961&amp;fp-y=0.4221&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=1a421d342d97d927895e6fc19fe63bd0 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/to-hold-the-government-accountable-we-need-to-know-what-its-doing-thats-why-were-tracking-ppp-data">
         To Hold the Government Accountable, We Need to Know What It’s Doing. That’s Why We’re Tracking PPP Data.
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        When Congress earmarked hundreds of billions of dollars for the Paycheck Protection Program, ProPublica believed the public had a right to know how the money was being spent. A federal judge agreed.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/jeremy-kutner">
          Jeremy Kutner
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-12EST05:00">
          March 12, 5 a.m. EST
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/6-questions-officials-still-havent-answered-after-weeks-of-hearings-on-the-capitol-attack">

      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/6-questions-officials-still-havent-answered-after-weeks-of-hearings-on-the-capitol-attack">
         6 Questions Officials Still Haven’t Answered After Weeks of Hearings on the Capitol Attack
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        More than 15 hours of testimony failed to answer fundamental questions about the Capitol attack. Among them: Why national security officials responded differently to BLM protesters than to Trump supporters.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/joaquin-sapien">
          Joaquin Sapien
         </a>
         and
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/joshua-kaplan">
          Joshua Kaplan
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">

          March 11, 5 a.m. EST
         </time>
        </p>

     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/cuomos-nursing-home-scandal-raises-questions-for-one-of-his-senior-aides">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210310-doh-report-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=f7413dd7eb8d709e937bd58301894059 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210310-doh-report-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=1e9ba2705373756af69100447af78757 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/20210310-doh-report-3x2.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=27104c02da235a3146c7a334c4f986d8 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/cuomos-nursing-home-scandal-raises-questions-for-one-of-his-senior-aides">
         Cuomo’s Nursing Home Scandal Raises Questions for One of His Senior Aides
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        Jim Malatras stood by a Cuomo administration report on nursing home deaths he knew undercounted the true loss of life. Today, he is chancellor of New York State’s public university system.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/joe-sexton">
          Joe Sexton
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-10EST14:30">
          March 10, 2:30 p.m. EST
         </time>
        </p>

      <div class="description">

         ProPublica a Finalist for Scripps Howard National Journalism Award
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/propublica">
          ProPublica
         </a>

     <div class="story-entry region-national section-articles">
      <div class="lead-art thumbnail">
       <a class="aspect-1-1" href="https://www.propublica.org/article/over-700-complaints-about-nypd-officers-abusing-protesters-then-silence">
        <img alt="" height="75" src="data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%27http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%27%20width%3D%271%27%20height%3D%271%27%20style%3D%27background%3Atransparent%27%2F%3E" srcset="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/698A8292.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=75&amp;q=70&amp;w=75&amp;s=dd86ce2e664f31695b199adc308dbd02 75w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/698A8292.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=150&amp;q=70&amp;w=150&amp;s=ddb975c85ad0ad3908f9282714c5a801 150w, https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/698A8292.jpg?crop=focalpoint&amp;fit=crop&amp;fp-x=0.5&amp;fp-y=0.5&amp;h=400&amp;q=70&amp;w=400&amp;s=729365984799f984efb9812d77d3e1ae 400w" width="75"/>
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="description">
       <h2 class="hed">
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/over-700-complaints-about-nypd-officers-abusing-protesters-then-silence">
         Over 700 Complaints About NYPD Officers Abusing Black Lives Matter Protesters, Then Silence
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div class="dek">
        Emails show New York City’s Civilian Complaint Review Board leaders discouraged staff from confronting the NYPD about a lack of cooperation on abuse investigations. The agency declined to disclose how many officers are facing misconduct charges.
       </div>
       <div class="metadata">
        <p class="byline">
         by
         <a class="name" href="https://www.propublica.org/people/eric-umansky">
          Eric Umansky
         </a>
        </p>
        <p class="timestamp">
         <time class="timestamp" datetime="2021-03-10EST05:00">
          March 10, 5 a.m. EST
         </time>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="content-bottom">
     </div>
     <footer class="browse-by-month">
      <form>

       Follow ProPublica
      </h2>

         </span>
        </a>
       </li>

          </use>
         </svg>
         <span>

         </span>
        </a>
       </li>

          <use xlink:href="#icon-rss">
          </use>
         </svg>
         <span>
          <abbr title="Rich Site Summary">
           RSS
          </abbr>
         </span>
        </a>
       </li>

       </h2>
       <p class="pp-module-description">

       </p>

     <div class="pp-module module-awards has-photo" id="l3">
      <p class="module-photo">
       <img alt="" src="https://assets.propublica.org/static/prod/v4/images/medal_franklin_128.png"/>
      </p>
      <div class="module-content">
       <h2 class="pp-module-title">
        Awards
       </h2>
       <p>
        ProPublica has been a recipient of the Pulitzer Prizes for public service, explanatory reporting, national reporting, investigative reporting and feature writing.
        <a href="/awards" id="awards-module">
         See the full list of our awards
        </a>
        .
       </p>
      </div>
      <!-- end .module-content -->
     </div>
     <!-- end .pp-module.module-awards -->
     <div class="pp-module module-corrections" id="l4">
      <div class="module-content">
       <h2 class="pp-module-title">
        Complaints &amp; Corrections
       </h2>
       <p>
        To contact us with concerns and corrections,
        <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#f99f9c9c9d9b989a92b9898b96898c9b95909a98d7968b9e">
         email us
        </a>
        . All emails may be published unless you tell us otherwise.
        <a href="https://www.propublica.org/corrections" id="corrections-module">
         Read our corrections
        </a>
        .
       </p>
      </div>

     <div class="pp-module promo-in-brief" id="r5">
      <div class="module-content">
       <a class="brief has-photo" href="/series/trump-inc" id="podcast-promo">
        <img alt="" class="brief-thumb" src="https://assets.propublica.org/static/prod/v4/images/promo-podcast-trump-inc.jpg"/>
        <div class="brief-description">
         <h2 class="hed">
          Podcast: Trump, Inc.
         </h2>
         <p class="brief-title">
          Exploring the mysteries of the president’s businesses, who profits and at what cost.
         </p>
        </div>
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <!-- end .pp-module.promo-in-brief -->
     <div class="pp-module promo-in-brief" id="r6">
      <div class="module-content" id="get-involved-module">
       <h2 class="pp-module-title">
        Get Involved
       </h2>
       <a class="brief" href="https://www.propublica.org/getinvolved/juvenile-justice-fees">
        <img alt="" class="brief-thumb" src="https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/2021-0128-juvenile-justice-folo-500x500.jpg" srcset="https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne75w/2021-0128-juvenile-justice-folo-500x500.jpg 75w, https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/2021-0128-juvenile-justice-folo-500x500.jpg 150w, https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne300w/2021-0128-juvenile-justice-folo-500x500.jpg 300w"/>
        <div class="brief-description">
         <h3 class="brief-title">
          Has Your Family Paid Fees or Fines to a Juvenile Justice System?
         </h3>
        </div>
        <!-- /end .brief-description -->
       </a>
       <a class="brief" href="https://www.propublica.org/getinvolved/help-propublica-find-the-most-important-stories-of-2021">
        <img alt="" class="brief-thumb" src="https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20210113-pitch-propublica-1x1.jpg" srcset="https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne75w/20210113-pitch-propublica-1x1.jpg 75w, https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20210113-pitch-propublica-1x1.jpg 150w, https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne300w/20210113-pitch-propublica-1x1.jpg 300w"/>
        <div class="brief-description">
         <h3 class="brief-title">
          Help ProPublica Find the Most Important Stories of 2021
         </h3>
        </div>
        <!-- /end .brief-description -->
       </a>
       <a class="brief" href="https://www.propublica.org/getinvolved/did-you-attend-the-milton-hershey-school-were-investigating-it-help-us">
        <img alt="" class="brief-thumb" src="https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20201123-hershey-callout-1x1.jpg" srcset="https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne75w/20201123-hershey-callout-1x1.jpg 75w, https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne150w/20201123-hershey-callout-1x1.jpg 150w, https://assets-c3.propublica.org/images/getInvolved/_oneOne300w/20201123-hershey-callout-1x1.jpg 300w"/>
        <div class="brief-description">
         <h3 class="brief-title">
          Did You Attend the Milton Hershey School? We’re Reporting on It. Help Us.
         </h3>
        </div>
        <!-- /end .brief-description -->
       </a>
      </div>
      <!-- /end .module-content -->
     </div>
     <!-- /end .pp-module.promo-in-brief -->
     <div class="pp-module module-popular" id="r7">
      <h2 class="pp-module-title">
       Most Popular Stories
      </h2>
      <div class="module-content" id="hottest-stories-module">
       <div class="tabs">
        <div class="pane-stories collapsible" data-collapsible-set="pp-stories-hottest">
         <h3 class="hed-stories">
          Most Read
         </h3>
         <ol class="list-plain list-stories">
          <li>
           <h3>
            <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/inside-turbotax-20-year-fight-to-stop-americans-from-filing-their-taxes-for-free" title="View this">

            </a>
           </h3>
          </li>
          <li>
           <h3>
            <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/turbotax-just-tricked-you-into-paying-to-file-your-taxes" title="View this">

            </a>
           </h3>
          </li>
          <li>

             America’s Drinking Water Is Surprisingly Easy to Poison
            </a>

          </li>

           <h3>
            <a href="https://www.propublica.org/article/nobody-hurt-just-a-perp-say-officers-after-nypd-shot-and-killed-man-in-his-own-home" title="View this">
             “Nobody” Hurt, “Just a Perp,” Say Officers After NYPD Shot and Killed Man in His Own Home
            </a>

  <div class="modal collapsible collapsible-collapsed" id="modal-republish">
   <div class="collapsible-header close-btn">
    <svg class="icon" height="24" width="24">
     <use xlink:href="#icon-close-light">
     </use>
    </svg>
    <span class="a11y">
     Close this screen
    </span>
   </div>
   <!-- end .collapsible-header -->
   <div class="collapsible-content content">
    <div class="wrapper">
     <h3>
      Republish This Story for Free
     </h3>
     <p class="license">
      <a href="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/" rel="license">
       Creative Commons License (CC BY-NC-ND 3.0)
      </a>
     </p>
     <div class="republish-instructions">
      <h3 class="title">
      </h3>
      <p class="byline">
      </p>
      <p class="intro">
       Thank you for your interest in republishing this story. You are are free to republish it so long as you do the following:
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        You have to credit us. In the byline, we prefer “Author Name, ProPublica.” At the top of the text of your story, include a line that reads: “This story was originally published by ProPublica.” You must link the word “ProPublica” to the original URL of the story.
       </li>
       <li>
        If you’re republishing online, you must link to the URL of this story on propublica.org, include all of the links from our story, including our newsletter sign up language and link, and use our
        <a href="/pixelping">
         PixelPing tag
        </a>
        .
       </li>
       <li>
        If you use canonical metadata, please use the ProPublica URL. For more information about canonical metadata,
        <a href="https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/139066?hl=en">
         refer to this Google SEO link
        </a>
        .
       </li>
       <li>
        You can’t edit our material, except to reflect relative changes in time, location and editorial style. (For example, “yesterday” can be changed to “last week,” and “Portland, Ore.” to “Portland” or “here.”)
       </li>
       <li>
        You cannot republish our photographs or illustrations without specific permission. Please contact
        <a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#abe6cecfc2caf9c2ccc3dfd8ebdbd9c4dbdec9c7c2c8ca85c4d9cc">
         <span class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="612c040508003308060915122111130e1114030d0802004f0e1306">
          [email protected]
         </span>
        </a>
        .
       </li>
       <li>
        It’s okay to put our stories on pages with ads, but not ads specifically sold against our stories. You can’t state or imply that donations to your organization support ProPublica’s work.
       </li>
       <li>
        You can’t sell our material separately or syndicate it. This includes publishing or syndicating our work on platforms or apps such as Apple News, Google News, etc.
       </li>
       <li>
        You can’t republish our material wholesale, or automatically; you need to select stories to be republished individually. (To inquire about syndication or licensing opportunities, contact our Vice President of Business Development,
        <a href="/people/celeste-lecompte">
         Celeste LeCompte
        </a>
        .)
       </li>
       <li>
        You can’t use our work to populate a website designed to improve rankings on search engines or solely to gain revenue from network-based advertisements.
       </li>
       <li>
        We do not generally permit translation of our stories into another language.
       </li>
       <li>
        Any website our stories appear on must include a prominent and effective way to contact you.
       </li>
       <li>
        If you share republished stories on social media, we’d appreciate being tagged in your posts. We have official accounts for ProPublica and ProPublica Illinois on both Twitter (
        <a href="https://twitter.com/propublica">
         @ProPublica
        </a>
        and
        <a href="https://twitter.com/propublicail">
         @ProPublicaIL
        </a>
        ) and Facebook.
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
     <!-- end .republish-content -->
     <div class="republish-copy">
      <p>
       Copy and paste the following into your page to republish:
      </p>
     </div>
     <!-- end .republish-copy -->
    </div>
    <!-- end .wrapper -->
   </div>

  </div>

  </script>
